name: Up Multiple Choice Quiz | Up | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was the name of the little girl that would become Carl's wife?
questions.explanation:
Ellie.

	Ellie and Carl met in an abandoned house where Ellie was using her imagination that the house was a ship and she was going on an adventure. Carl was partaking in his own bout of imagination play when he heard her in the house. They later married, moved into the house where they first met, and lived there together until Ellie died.

questions.text: When Carl got the mail out of his mailbox one morning, what leaflet was the first thing he saw?
options: Buy One, Get One Free Milkshake
questions.explanation:
Shady Oaks Retirement Village.

	Carl got rid of the leaflet because he didn't want to go to a retirement village. Only when he struck a construction worker with his cane was Carl told to go to Shady Oaks Retirement Village by the court. On the day he was to be picked up, Carl let loose thousands of balloons which picked his house up from the foundation and lifted it into the sky.

questions.text: Why did Russell, the wilderness explorer, show up at Carl's house?
options: To ask him why he hadn't moved yet
To wish him a happy birthday
questions.explanation:
To earn a new badge.

	Russell was a Korean American boy who was with Wilderness Explorers, Tribe Fifty-Four, Sweat Lodge Twelve. Russell needed his 'assisting the elderly' badge and went to Carl to ask if he needed any help. Carl sent him off to look for a snipe. Russell was at Carl's when Carl lifted the house from its foundation.

questions.text: Where was Paradise Falls located, where Carl and his wife saved money to go?
questions.explanation:
South America.

	Ellie and Carl saved their change to go to Paradise Falls in South America. Over time, life got in the way and they had to use their money for other things. Ellie died before Carl could show her the tickets he purchased for them to go to Venezuela.  Paradise Falls was based on Angel Falls in Venezuela.

questions.text: While walking to Paradise Falls, Russell found the "snipe" that Carl told him about. What did Russell name the bird?
questions.explanation:
Kevin.

	Russell found Kevin while out using the bathroom. Russell got Kevin to follow him by dropping bits of chocolate from a candy bar. Kevin was the bird Charles Muntz was looking for. Russell and Carl tried keep Kevin safe from Muntz.

questions.text: What animals did Russell and Carl find at Paradise Falls that could talk with help from electronic collars?
questions.explanation:
Dogs.

	For some unexplained reason, there were dogs at Paradise Falls. Muntz had all the dogs fashioned with electronic collars. Muntz named the dogs after the Greek alphabet except for one dog named Dug. Dug knew that Muntz wanted Kevin and referred to the bird as "Dug's prisoner".

questions.text: To punish Carl and Russell for protecting the "snipe", what did Charles Muntz do to Carl and his wife's home?
questions.explanation:
Set it on fire.

	Charles set Carl and his wife's house on fire to distract Carl from helping Kevin. The plan worked and Carl left Kevin to save his house. Charles was able to kidnap Kevin and get away.

questions.text: While trying to rescue the "snipe" from Charles Muntz, what did Russell use, along with the balloons, to get him to the airship faster?
questions.explanation:
Leaf blower.

	Russell tied some balloons to himself and used a leaf blower to blow him toward the airship. It worked, but, unfortunately, Russell was captured moments after he entered the airship. Carl helped him escape and then went to rescue Kevin.

questions.text: After rescuing Kevin from Charles Muntz, how did Carl and Russell return home?
questions.explanation:
Charles Muntz's airship.

	Charles fell to his death leaving Carl and Russell on the airship. Kevin was taken back to her family and Carl watched his and his Ellie's house disappear below the clouds. Carl and Russell used the blimp to return home along with Dug and the other dogs.

questions.text: At Russell's award ceremony, Carl gave Russell the badge his wife gave him when they first met. What was the name on the pop lid badge that Carl pinned to Russell's sash?
questions.explanation:
Grape Soda.

	When Carl and his wife first met, she pinned a Grape soda pop lid to Carl's clothes like a badge. At Russell's badge ceremony, Carl pinned Russell's 'assisting the elderly' badge onto his sash along with the grape soda badge Ellie gave Carl. He referred to it as the highest honor Carl could bestow. Russell was prouder of that badge than the badge his scout leader gave him.
